# PdfObjectConfig.CompressionThreshold property

Gets or sets a value that establishes the threshold from which the output stream will be compressed, this value will be set to MB, remember that a MB equals 1.024 Bytes.

```csharp
public float CompressionThreshold { get; set; }
```

## Property Value

A Single that contains compression threshold in MB.
